Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a set of allowed values are defined for this attribute. Default value: "N".
Attribute.Name: IsitCommercial

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a set of allowed values are defined for this attribute. Default value: "N".
Attribute.Name: IsitEditable

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a set of allowed values are defined for this attribute. Default value: "N".
Attribute.Name: IsitMandatory

Attribute.Description: This flag indicates whether a set of allowed values are defined for this attribute. Default value: "N".
Attribute.Name: IsitVisible

Attribute.Description: This field captures Min Multiplicity of the attribute
Attribute.Name: DefinesMinMultiplicity

Attribute.Description: This field captures Max Multiplicity of the attribute
Attribute.Name: DefinesMaxMultiplicity

Attribute.Description: This field is for capturing minimum value of attributes
Attribute.Name: MinimumValue

Attribute.Description: This field is for capturing maximum value of attributes
Attribute.Name: MaximumValue

Attribute.Description: This field is for capturing parameter path
Attribute.Name: ParameterPath

Attribute.Description: This field is for capturing maximum value of attributes
Attribute.Name: SourceDataType

Attribute.Description: This field is for capturing if the item is printable
Attribute.Name: Printable
